AboutMyself.Text: - Hello, I'm Ramadan./-  Web Developer./-  Full Stack (MERN)./,- Web Developer, Full Stack (MERN)./

SiteDefinition.Title: Site Definition
SiteDefinition.Description: It is an affiliate marketing website that showcases home products, clothing, outdoor products, and electrical appliances.

ImportantPoints.Title: Important Points
ImportantPoints.ControlPanel: Control Panel: Displays statistics and reports on orders and commissions.
ImportantPoints.ProductManagement: Product Management: Add, edit, and view products with details like name, price, images, and description.
ImportantPoints.OrderManagement: Order Management: View order details such as customer name, address, quantity, and price, along with tracking the order status.
ImportantPoints.ShoppingCart: Shopping Cart: View products added to the cart with options to edit or remove them.
ImportantPoints.Support: Support: Provide means of communication with the support team via WhatsApp and Facebook.
ImportantPoints.OrderForm: Order Form: Enter order details such as customer name, phone number, address, quantity, and shipping price.
ImportantPoints.DetailsPage: Details Page: Display product details such as name, images, price, commission, shipping, and description.

ProjectDetails.Title: Technologies Used
ProjectDetails.Description: Uses the latest technologies such as Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Redux Toolkit to build fast and efficient interfaces with robust state management and seamless server interaction.

Technologies._2: Tailwind CSS for styling and design.

ProjectImages.Title1: Some pictures from the control panel (admin)

SiteDefinition_2.Title: Site Definition
SiteDefinition_2.Description: It is a story management system that tracks the status of stories through various production stages such as cutting, back, chest, assembly, storage, washing, packing, and final storage.

ImportantPoints_2.Title: Important Points
ImportantPoints_2.AdminPage: Allows the admin to add the cuts (work) to the site and monitor their status. The admin can enter details such as work order, model number, quantity, name, status, received settings, notes, last update time, and supervisor name.
ImportantPoints_2.SupervisorPage: Allows supervisors to update the status of the cuts and add notes. The status includes stages such as cutting, back, front, assembly, storage, laundry, packing, and final storage. The supervisor's name and update time are recorded.
ImportantPoints_2.SearchFunctionality: Allows users to search for cuts by name, quantity, work order, or model number.

Project_2_Details.Title: Technologies Used
Project_2_Details.Description: Uses the latest technologies such as Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Redux Toolkit to build fast and efficient interfaces with robust state management and seamless server interaction.

Technologies._2: Tailwind CSS for styling and design.

ProjectImages.Title1: Some pictures from the control panel (admin)

Project_3_Attendance.Title: Attendance Log School
Project_3_Attendance.Description: Attendance Log School is a comprehensive system for managing student attendance in primary schools. It aims to improve efficiency and simplify administrative processes related to attendance and student promotion. The application features a responsive, Arabic-supported user interface, making it suitable for use across various devices.

MainFeatures.AttendanceManagement: Record student check-in and check-out times accurately and easily.
MainFeatures.AttendanceReports: Generate detailed attendance reports categorized by month and year.
MainFeatures.StudentPromotion: Promote successful students to the new academic year while excluding those who failed.
MainFeatures.AdminPanel: Manage student data, control attendance records, and promote students.
MainFeatures.SecureAuthentication: Confirm sensitive operations with administrative passwords.
MainFeatures.ResponsiveDesign: Works smoothly on both desktop and mobile devices.

Frontend._1: React and Next.js for building the user interface.
Frontend._2: Tailwind CSS for responsive and user-friendly design.

Backend._1: Node.js with Express.js for developing a robust API.
Backend._2: MongoDB for data management using NoSQL database.
Backend._4: cors for secure communication between server and frontend.

PromotionFeature.Title: Student Promotion Feature
PromotionFeature.Description: This feature allows the admin to select students who failed (via their codes) and promote only the successful students to the new academic year. The operation is confirmed through a popup requiring the admin password for security.

ProjectGoal.Title: Project Goal
ProjectGoal.Description: To provide an integrated digital solution for managing student attendance and promotion, helping schools enhance efficiency, reduce manual errors, and ensure a smooth and secure user experience.

Integration.Title: Frontend & Backend Integration
Integration.Description: Attendance is recorded via a fully integrated API connected to the frontend. The server supports operations like user registration, login, attendance management, exporting attendance reports to Excel files, and checking students’ daily attendance status. The backend is designed with a modular architecture that makes it easy to maintain and extend with new features.

ProjectImages.Title1: Some pictures from the control panel (admin)

Project_Olive_Oil_Store.Title: Integrated Olive Oil Store
Project_Olive_Oil_Store.Description: The Olive Oil Store is a fully integrated system for managing and selling olive oil products online with a professional user experience. The system provides a dynamic admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and reviews, with full data protection and a responsive, Arabic-supported interface.

MainFeatures.Title: Key Features
MainFeatures.DynamicProductManagement: Dynamic product management with the ability to update settings (prices, quantities, discounts) through the admin dashboard.
MainFeatures.OrderTracking: Order status tracking with an interactive timeline and instant notifications for users.
MainFeatures.ReviewSystem: Integrated review system with the ability to add and display reviews dynamically, with control over the number of displayed reviews and a button to add new reviews.
MainFeatures.SecureAuthentication: Secure login and authentication using JWT, with tokens stored in cookies, and full protection for admin, orders, and reviews interfaces.
MainFeatures.CentralizedAPISettings: Centralized API links configuration in a single file for easier maintenance and development.
MainFeatures.ResponsiveDesign: Fully responsive user interface using Tailwind CSS, compatible with all devices for a smooth user experience.
MainFeatures.CodeSeparation: Separation of JavaScript code into independent files for each logic (products, orders, reviews, authentication) to improve maintainability.

Frontend._1: HTML5 and CSS3 with Tailwind CSS for a modern, responsive interface.
Frontend._2: Vanilla JavaScript for interactive logic and page dynamics.
Frontend._3: Scripts are separated into independent files for each feature.

Backend._1: Node.js with Express.js to build a strong REST API.
Backend._2: MongoDB for data management using NoSQL database.
Backend._4: JWT for user authentication and authorization.
Backend._5: cors, helmet, and rate-limit for security and protection.

ReviewFeature.Title: Dynamic Reviews Feature
ReviewFeature.Description: Users can easily add their reviews through a dedicated modal, with dynamic display of reviews and a show more/less button. Reviews update instantly after submission without page reload.

ProjectGoal.Title: Project Goal
ProjectGoal.Description: To provide a complete digital platform for selling and managing olive oil products, ensuring a professional user experience, full protection, and easy management of products, orders, and reviews.

Integration.Title: Frontend and Backend Integration
Integration.Description: The frontend integrates with the backend through a unified REST API that supports all operations (login, product management, orders, reviews) with full data protection and flexibility for future expansion.

ProjectImages.Title1: Images from Admin Panel and Main Interface

Project_Kharji_Cleaning_Services.Title: Al-Kharji General Cleaning Services
Project_Kharji_Cleaning_Services.Description: A fully integrated website for Al-Kharji General Cleaning Services, specialized in providing cleaning services in Riyadh and Al-Kharj regions, with online booking and smart customer interaction.

MainFeatures.Title: Project Features
MainFeatures.ModernUI: Interactive and modern user interface built with React and Next.js, supporting RTL for Arabic.
MainFeatures.GalleryCarousel: Animated image gallery showcasing samples of cleaning works attractively.
MainFeatures.ChatBot: Smart interactive chatbot powered by OpenAI, responding to customer inquiries in Saudi dialect.
MainFeatures.Security: JWT authentication system to ensure session security and interactions.
MainFeatures.SessionManagement: Session management with chat history storage for continuous customer interaction.
MainFeatures.Analytics: Usage analytics to track user clicks and improve user experience.
MainFeatures.ResponsiveDesign: Responsive design using Tailwind CSS, supporting all devices and screen sizes.
MainFeatures.Content: Comprehensive content including services, booking times, covered areas, and contact details.

Dashboard.Title: Dashboard
Dashboard.ChatMonitoring: Display conversations between the AI assistant and users for monitoring.
Dashboard.UserData: Show user data and booking requests for easier management.

Frontend._1: React with Next.js for building a modern interface.

Backend._1: Node.js with Express to build REST API.

AI._1: OpenAI API for powering the smart assistant.

ProjectGoal.Title: Project Goal
ProjectGoal.Description: Provide an easy-to-use platform for booking cleaning services with a smart assistant that helps customers choose suitable services and confirm bookings smoothly and effectively.

Integration.Title: Frontend and Backend Integration
Integration.Description: Integration through unified REST API supporting login, booking, session management, and analytics with full data protection.

Down_Syndrome_Support_Platform.Title: Down Syndrome Support Platform
Down_Syndrome_Support_Platform.Description: A comprehensive platform to support families of children with Down Syndrome. The project includes a content management dashboard, a smart Gemini AI-powered chat, and a secure API for integration with other applications. My main responsibility in this project was building and managing the backend system, including authentication, data management, and API integration, while collaborating closely with a frontend developer to ensure seamless integration.

MainFeatures.Title: Key Features
MainFeatures.Dashboard: Comprehensive dashboard for managing users, content, and media.
MainFeatures.AIChat: Smart chat powered by Gemini AI to provide simple, practical advice to families.
MainFeatures.Authentication: JWT-based authentication system for login and access control.
MainFeatures.FileUpload: Image upload and management using ImgBB API.
MainFeatures.TokenManagement: Refresh Token system to securely extend session lifetimes.

Dashboard.Title: Dashboard
Dashboard.ContentManagement: Manage educational articles and Down Syndrome-related content.
Dashboard.UserManagement: Add and update user data with role-based access control.
Dashboard.ChatMonitoring: Monitor conversations between the smart chat and users.

Backend._1: Node.js with Express.js to build a flexible REST API.
Backend._2: MongoDB and Mongoose for efficient data management.
Backend._3: TypeScript for code quality and maintainability.
Backend._4: JWT and secured cookies for authentication and session management.
Backend._5: Crypto-TS for password and sensitive data encryption.
Backend._6: ImgBB Integration for image upload and management.

AI._1: Gemini AI API for powering the smart chat system.

ProjectGoal.Title: Project Goal
ProjectGoal.Description: To build a digital platform that provides fast, reliable support for families, along with admin tools for developers and researchers to improve user experience and raise awareness about Down Syndrome.

Integration.Title: Frontend & Backend Integration
Integration.Description: Full integration through a unified REST API supporting authentication, data management, image upload, and interaction with the smart chat system. Collaborated with a frontend developer to ensure a seamless user experience.

Project_7_Ecommerce.Title: E-commerce Platform Backend
Project_7_Ecommerce.Description: A professional backend for an e-commerce platform supporting multi-channel authentication, product and order management, and a rich reviews system with instant notifications. Built for small and medium stores and operations teams, with a delivery timeline of 6–8 weeks covering design, development, integration, testing, and deployment.

MainFeatures.Title: Key Features
MainFeatures.MultiChannelAuth: Authentication via email/password, Google OAuth, and phone OTP with separate web and mobile flows.
MainFeatures.CoreModules: Core modules: products, categories, cart, orders, site settings, and store owner management.
MainFeatures.AdvancedReviews: Advanced reviews: add, view, vote, report, and analytics.
MainFeatures.Notifications: Integrations: Telegram notifications for new orders and email confirmations.
MainFeatures.ImageUploads: External image uploads for product and review media.

Backend._1: Node.js with Express.js to build a robust REST API.
Backend._2: MongoDB with Mongoose for data modeling and persistence.
Backend._3: JWT for authentication and session security.
Backend._4: Google OAuth and phone OTP for multi-channel login.
Backend._5: cors, helmet, and rate-limit for security and protection.

Services._1: Telegram Bot API for instant order notifications.
Services._3: External image storage for media uploads.

ProjectGoal.Title: Project Goal
ProjectGoal.Description: Deliver a secure, performant backend that simplifies store operations, enables reliable purchasing and reviews, and provides instant operational visibility.

Integration.Title: Frontend & Mobile Integration
Integration.Description: Unified REST APIs with separated web/mobile auth flows, real-time Telegram notifications, email confirmations, and external image storage.

ProjectImages.Title1: Images from admin dashboard and API
